title: If I cheated in a class then moved to a higher grade, will my continuing studies be haram? assim al
transcript: Arabi from Bangladesh Sega I had two questions last week I asked but I will ask one I know the rules good my uh Sheikh my question is regarding the other question you just answered uh that uh in exam if we cheat and do a job then it would not be Haram but my question is like if I cheated on Class 10 then I moved to plus 11 or like if I moved into a university by giving an exam will my continuing of the studies Haram or not no it's not Haram and the answer applies to your case as well and Allah Knows Best foreign
